artist: Artist: Antonio Saura; Author: Fernando Arrabal; Publisher: Yves Rivière Editeur, Paris
description: plastic container; seven folded sheets each containing a black and white photo image of a couple engaged in a sex act, followed by abstracted line drawings of the same scene; text; loose volume; lender's archive #007

title: L'odeur de la sainteté (The Odor of Sanctity)
